ygData.subject: RE: Re: Blackened Iron (meta)
ygData.msgSnippet: Chord of discord, Binding, and chain does not effect the warriors or the raiders.  I tried those out already and they always resisted.  All my skills are max.
ygData.messageBody:
Chord of discord, Binding, and chain does not effect the warriors or the
raiders. I tried those out already and they always resisted. All my skills
are max.

Your Friendly Rogue and Bard
Hammerpaw and Syren Wind
Champions of Norrath, The Rathe



-----Original Message-----
From: Keith G. Spencer [mailto:kgs@...]
Sent: Thursday, July 22, 1999 10:58 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: Blackened Iron (meta)


From: "Keith G. Spencer" <kgs@...>

Given that you're only 25th, you're a bit limited in non-party or target
songs since pickclaws are so much higher level than you... you can help this
by raising your CHA (items, shaman / enchanter buffs), also if you can get
an enchanter in your group tashani'ing will help significantly.

Chant of Battle - Might want to use this instead of Anthem, especially if
anyone's using proc'ing weapons. Some will argue the slight speedup isn't
worth the extra dex chant gives ya.

Chords & Discord - Both are extremely useful especially when stacked and one
of them is played, but in HK I'm a bit warry of using them, I'm always
afraid i'll get a guard in the radius through a ceiling or something.

Binding - The -AC will be useful especially if your melee types are well
below the goblins as well. Otherwise Chain's preferable.

Chain - This song's wonderful. Especially in HK where runner control is
needed.
-----Original Message-----
From: CMai <CMai@...>
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com' <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, July 22, 1999 10:44 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Blackened Iron (meta)


>From: CMai <CMai@...>
>
>I have a question. I am currently lvl 25 and the 3 songs that I twist when
>I am in a group in High Keep are Anthem, Psalm of Warmth, and healing. I
am
>usually group with people who are lvl 28-33 in there killing raiders and
>warriors (non-magic users). I cannot think of any other song in my
>inventory that I can used except for these 3. Any other song has no effect
>on them. Since these post mention that a lvl 20 playing a hymn song is sad
>can you all tell me what other song that I can play to improve my group? I
>think the song that a bard use depends on the situation. That is one of
the
>unique thing about being a bard.
>
>Thnx for all the info,
>Your Friendly Rogue and Bard
>Hammerpaw and Syren Wind
>Champions of Norrath, The Rathe
